title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8B.09 - DO NOT STOP ON TRACKS Sign (R8-8)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8B.09 - DO NOT STOP ON TRACKS Sign (R8-8)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 00A The R8-8 sign shall not be used in New York. The State

Law DO NOT STOP ON TRACKS (NYR9-5) sign shall be used in its place, subject to
the provisions of this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8B.09

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
